Jacobin is a magazine of culture and polemic that Edmund Burke ceaselessly berates on his Twitter page. Each of our issueÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s contents are pored over in taverns and other houses of ill repute and best enjoyed with a well-shaken can of lukewarm beer.
